author: Saabira Chaudhuri and Costas Paris
title: Unilever Board Meets On Possible Move To Rotterdam
text:
LONDONâ€”The board of Anglo-Dutch consumer-goods giant Unilever PLC has decided to consolidate its dual headquarters in Rotterdam, according to a person familiar with the matter.
In a Wednesday afternoon board meeting, directors decided on Rotterdam, in the Netherlands, over London, this person said.
Unilever is set to announce the decision... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
